original_text: I will make a covenant with them to give them peace. It is a promise to my people that will continue for ever. I will cause them to live safely in their land. I will cause them to grow in number. I will put my temple among them, to be with them for ever.
korean_text: 내가 그들과 화평의 언약을 세워서 영원한 언약이 되게 하고 또 그들을 견고하고 번성하게 하며 내 성소를 그 가운데에 세워서 영원히 이르게 하리니

sentences.original_text: I will make a covenant with them
It is a promise to my people
I will cause them to live safely
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 안전하게 살게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will cause them to grow in number
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 수적으로 늘어나게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will put my temple among them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 성전을 그들 가운데 두겠다

sentences.original_text: to be with them for ever
